org.logl.logl

Interface AdjustableLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Logger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DuplicatingLogger

    public interface AdjustableLogger
extends Logger
    A Logger that can adjust the level it logs at.

    • Method Summary
